name: Dr. Sarah Chen
bio: Expert in forensic document analysis with over 15 years of experience in authenticating historical documents and autographs.

name: Michael Rodriguez
bio: Former sports journalist turned authentication expert, specializing in sports memorabilia and athlete autographs.

name: Emily Watson
bio: Curator and authentication specialist with expertise in music, film, and entertainment memorabilia.

name: James Park
bio: AI and machine learning engineer developing advanced authentication algorithms for probabilistic verification.
